_header: Here have I dwelled with more and less
_description: Farewell to Christmas — seven quatrains (aaab) and burden: ‘Now haue gud day now haue gud day / I am crystmas and now I go my way’

OxfBal354.First Lines:
Here haue I dwellyd with more & lasseFrom Halowtyde till
                    Candylmas…
OxfBal354.Last Lines:
…Yet for my sake make ye gud cherNow haue gud
                    dayExplicit
